title: Summer Storms
description: A broken down house, four hurricanes and a broken man.Elizabeth Reynolds knows she is blessed. She has friends and a job she loves. So why does she feel something is missing? Restoring a broken down house was supposed to be the missing piece, but then she met Jeffrey Robbins a man frozen in grief.Set in downtown Orlando Summer Storms offers an inside look into the workings of the industry.
author: Rebekah Lyn
